name: BrightLemon™
tag_list: drupal, drupal-training, web-developer, online-communities, old-street, silicon-roundabout, third-sector, cms
overview:
BrightLemon has over 8 years expertise as a specialist Drupal web developer and builder of online communities.

Located in the heart of London’s Old Street Silicon Roundabout community; BrightLemon works primarily on creating user-friendly social networks with interactive tools that allow ideas, movements, petitions and campaigns to gain momentum and be communicated to a wider, more involved community.

With a current focus on education and charity; clients include some of the world’s leading organisations including Teach First, Cambridge University, UK Department for Education and Amnesty International. As active supporter of and contributor to the Drupal open source commnuity, case studies and training have been featured by Mashable, MySQL and Dries Buytaert (the founder of Drupal).
